title: FXeducator Forex Trading with Ed Ponsi
description:
Ed Ponsi is the President of FXEducator LLC and is the former Chief Trading Instructor for Forex Capital Markets (FXCM). An experienced professional trader and money manager, Ed has advised hedge funds, institutional traders, and individuals of all levels of skill and experience. A sought-after public speaker, consultant, commentator and writer, Ed has appeared in numerous seminars, trading magazines, and live broadcasts, and is a frequent contributor to trading websites.

Forex Trading Strategies takes an in-depth look at technical analysis, fundamental analysis, stop placement, risk management, and gives you five step-by-step trading strategies for the forex market. As forex traders mature, they must strike a balance between using technical and fundamental analysis, as well as choosing a precise stop. all the while taking into account a predetermined level of risk.

Forex Trading Strategies will not only teach you how to trade, it will teach you how to maximize the chances of trading successfully. Most beginners do not know much more than how to research and execute a trade, but students of Forex Trading Strategies will be able to better time position entries and exits, thus enhancing potentioal profits.
